54:["$","p",null,{"children":["ID Analyzer has established itself as a dominant force in the identity verification market by offering ",["$","strong",null,{"children":"enterprise-grade features at $0.11 per verification"}],", representing the most cost-effective solution available. 56:["$","p",null,{"children":["The identity verification industry is experiencing significant transformation, with ",["$","$L13",null,{"href":"https://www.biometricupdate.com/202412/identity-verification-scale-and-maturity-to-push-average-cost-down","children":"global average costs expected to decline from $0.20 in 2025 to $0.17 by 2029"}],". 6c:["$","p",null,{"children":["The ",["$","$L13",null,{"href":"https://www.biometricupdate.com/202412/identity-verification-scale-and-maturity-to-push-average-cost-down","children":"downward pressure on pricing"}]," reflects market maturation and increased competition. As verification technology becomes commoditized, providers must differentiate through pricing transparency, ease of integration, customer support quality, and specialized features rather than basic functionality."]}]
6d:["$","h3",null,{"className":"flex scroll-m-28 flex-row items-center gap-2","id":"feature-standardization-impact","children":[["$","a",null,{"data-card":"","href":"#feature-standardization-impact","className":"peer","children":"Feature Standardization Impact"}],["$","svg",null,{"ref":"$undefined","xmlns":"http://www.w3.org/2000/svg","width":24,"height":24,"viewBox":"0 0 24 24","fill":"none","stroke":"currentColor","strokeWidth":2,"strokeLinecap":"round","strokeLinejoin":"round","className":"lucide size-3.5 shrink-0 text-fd-muted-foreground opacity-0 transition-opacity peer-hover:opacity-100","aria-label":"Link to section","children":[[["$","path","1cjeqo",{"d":"M10 13a5 5 0 0 0 7.54.54l3-3a5 5 0 0 0-7.07-7.07l-1.72 1.71"}],["$","path","19qd67",{"d":"M14 11a5 5 0 0 0-7.54-.54l-3 3a5 5 0 0 0 7.07 7.07l1.71-1.71"}]],"$undefined"]}]]}]
6e:["$","p",null,{"children":[["$","$L13",null,{"href":"https://veridas.com/en/identity-verification-companies/","children":"Core verification capabilities"}]," have become standardized across the industry, including document verification for government-issued IDs, biometric facial recognition with liveness detection, AML/KYC compliance screening, comprehensive API integration, and global coverage.
